00027 
00028 typedef std::vector<double> doubleVec;
00029 
00030 /*============================================================================*/
00031 void testPlane() {
00032     /* * * create plane * * */
00033     doubleVec center(3,0.0);
00034     doubleVec normal(3,0.0);
00035 
00036     normal[0] = 1.0;
00037 
00038     center[0] = 1.0;
00039     center[1] = 1.0;
00040 
00041     Plane thePlane(normal, center);
00042 
00043     /* * * create "particle" * * */
00044     doubleVec particleLoc(3,0.0);
00045     doubleVec particleDir(3,0.0);
00046 
00047 
00048     particleLoc[0] = 1.5;
00049     particleDir[1] = 1.0;
00050 
00051     /********************/
00052     Quadric::HitAndDist planeResult;
00053 
00054     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(thePlane.hasPosSense(particleLoc) == true);
00055 
00056     planeResult  = thePlane.intersect(particleLoc, particleDir, true);
00057 
00058     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(planeResult.first == false);
00059 
00060     /********************/
00061     particleLoc[0] = -1;
00062     particleLoc[1] = -1;
00063     particleLoc[2] = 0.5;
00064 
00065     particleDir[0] = 0.707106781186547;
00066     particleDir[1] = 0.707106781186547;
00067     particleDir[2] = 0.0;
00068 
00069     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(thePlane.hasPosSense(particleLoc) == false);
00070 
00071     planeResult  = thePlane.intersect(particleLoc, particleDir, false);
00072 
00073 //    cout << "Did hit: "  << planeResult.first << endl
00074 //         << "distance: " << planeResult.second << endl;
00075 
00076     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(planeResult.first == true);
00077     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(planeResult.second, 2.828427124746190));
00078 
00079     /* *******************\
00080      * move particle 
00081      ****************** */
00082 
00083     particleDir[0] = 0.707106781186547;
00084     particleDir[1] = -0.707106781186547;
00085     particleDir[2] = 0.0;
00086 
00087     /********************/
00088     planeResult  = thePlane.intersect(particleLoc, particleDir, false);
00089 
00090     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(planeResult.first == true);
00091     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(planeResult.second, 2.828427124746190));
00092     /********************/
00093 }
00094 /*============================================================================*/
00095 void testPlaneX() {
00096     /* * * create plane * * */
00097     PlaneX thePlane(1.0);
00098 
00099     /* * * create "particle" * * */
00100     doubleVec particleLoc(3,0.0);
00101     doubleVec particleDir(3,0.0);
00102 
00103 
00104     particleLoc[0] = 1.5;
00105     particleDir[1] = 1.0;
00106 
00107     /********************/
00108     Quadric::HitAndDist planeResult;
00109 
00110     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(thePlane.hasPosSense(particleLoc) == true);
00111 
00112     planeResult  = thePlane.intersect(particleLoc, particleDir, true);
00113 
00114     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(planeResult.first == false);
00115 
00116     /********************/
00117     particleLoc[0] = -1;
00118     particleLoc[1] = -1;
00119     particleLoc[2] = 0.5;
00120 
00121     particleDir[0] = 0.707106781186547;
00122     particleDir[1] = 0.707106781186547;
00123     particleDir[2] = 0.0;
00124 
00125     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(thePlane.hasPosSense(particleLoc) == false);
00126 
00127     planeResult  = thePlane.intersect(particleLoc, particleDir, false);
00128 
00129     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(planeResult.first == true);
00130     TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(softEquiv(planeResult.second, 2.828427124746190));
00131 }

00133 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00134     TESTER_INIT("Plane");
00135     try {
00136         testPlane();
00137         testPlaneX();
00138     }
00139     catch (tranSupport::tranError &theErr) {
00140         cout << "UNEXPECTED ERROR IN UNIT TEST: " << endl
00141             << theErr.what() << endl;
00142         TESTER_CHECKFORPASS(false);
00143     }
00144 
00145     TESTER_PRINTRESULT();
00146     
00147     return 0;
00148 }
